import React, { useState } from 'react'; const FloatingToolbar = ({ onNavigatePrevious, onNavigateNext, onToggleMinimap, onToggleSearch, onZoomIn, onZoomOut, onResetZoom, changes, currentChangeIndex, minimapVisible, searchVisible, zoomLevel }) => { const [isExpanded, setIsExpanded] = useState(false); return (
setIsExpanded(!isExpanded)}> {isExpanded ? '‚úï' : 'üõ†Ô∏è'}
{isExpanded && (
{/* Navigation Controls */}
Navigate
{changes.length === 0 ? '0/0' : `${currentChangeIndex + 1}/${changes.length}`}
{/* View Controls */}
View
{/* Zoom Controls */}
Zoom
{Math.round(zoomLevel * 100)}%
)}
); }; export default FloatingToolbar;
